name: Kitex Garments Announces Record Turnover
description: Kitex Garments Limited has announced a robust performance with a record turnover. The company, known for its infant wear, is expanding its operations and market presence. The investment in new integrated textile units in Telangana aims to diversify its product range and reduce dependency on key customers. The expansion is expected to bolster Kitex’s market position and enhance its operational efficiencies.

name: Kitex to Commence Operations in Telangana
description: Kitex Garments is set to start operations in Telangana in March 2024, creating employment opportunities for 50,000 people, predominantly women. The company is investing Rs. 3,000 crore in new units at Warangal and Sitarampur, aiming to produce 22 lakh garments per day. The initiative will significantly benefit the local economy and the state’s cotton farmers.

name: Kitex Garments’ First Unit in Telangana
description: Kitex Garments has committed to investing Rs. 3,000 crore in Telangana, with the first unit set to open by June 2023. This project will create 28,000 jobs, primarily for women, and aims to export 2.5 million units of ‘Made in Telangana’ infant wear to the US. This move highlights Telangana’s conducive environment for business and investment.
